title: The Queen's Revenge
description: After Miranda's first love, Ben was brutally murdered in front of her very own eyes, she tries to move forward with her new life. While her new husband can never replace her lost love, he is an excellent husband, father and king. As Miranda tries recover from a great loss, she is still haunted her lost love in her dreams. As her traumatic memories only take place at night, she keeps herself busy during the day with not only her typical duties, but getting to know her biological father. As Miranda feels obligated to spend time with her malevolent birth father, her feelings towards him become twisted.  When Miranda comes up with what she believes is a brilliant plan to have a relationship with her estranged father, tragedy strikes in the middle of the night, and the Realm of Sidhe is struck with horror, and her hopes and dreams of getting to know her father turn to ash.  To make things right and save what they lost, Miranda and Damon must take desperate measures and travel with a small group of others, across the unforgiving Sidhe terrain. Every moment spent in the snow covered hell is a battle of life and death, and when Miranda finally finds what was taken from her, she has to make a sacrifice to save the one she loves.
author: Kelsey Schaeffer
